item.name: Dove
item.desc: The bird is fast and powerful in flies. It eats corn, millet, bean, groundnut and fruit. It is bold enough to allow itself to be approach

item.name: Ostrich
item.desc: The bird foods consist of leaves of shrubs and plant. The males as well as females incubate the egg in turn.

item.name: Guinea fowl
item.desc: A bird with slate-coloured, white-spotted plumage. The bird is domesticated by humans as a source of food, fulfilling a similar role as the chicken.

item.name: Parrot
item.desc: It is most intelligent birds known for their wittiness, amusement, and incredibly affectionate side as well. It capable of imitating many different sounds with advanced vocal cords, and often mimics human speech.

item.name: Peacock
item.desc: It tail feathers grow up to 5 feet long. Males spread them out to make themselves look bigger to scare off predators as well as impress the ladies with how fancy they look.

item.name: Chicken
item.desc: They are easily to rural environments and mostly found in rural and semi-urban area. They are self-reliant and feed themselves by looking for kitchen wastes, insects, worms, lizards and plant seeds and leaves.

item.name: Hen
item.desc: It is a small size chicken raise for meat and egg production. The usually be with their mother for several before can be self-reliant.

item.name: Duck
item.desc: They are aquatics with flat bills and specialized in webbed feet for swimming. The bird are small with shorten neck.

item.name: Cat
item.desc: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short snout, and retractile claws.
item.hdesc: Karamar dabbar dabbar dabbar gida mai laushi mai laushi, gajeriyar hanci, da farata mai ja da baya.

item.name: Cattle
item.desc: Large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, chiefly domesticated for meat or milk or as beasts of burden; cows and oxen.
item.hdesc: Manya-manyan namomin jeji masu ƙahoni da kofato, waɗanda aka fi sani da gida don nama ko madara ko kuma naman kaya.

item.name: Cow
item.desc: A fully grown female animal of a domesticated breed of ox. (in farming) an animal of this type which has borne more than one calf.
item.hdesc: Dabbobin mace mai girma na irin sa na gida.

item.name: Dog
item.desc: A domesticated animal used by hunter for chasing prey. It can be used as a security guard at home because of the ability perceived the odor of a visitor.
item.hdesc: Dabbobin gida da mafarauci ke amfani da shi wajen farautar ganima.

item.name: Donkey
item.desc: A domesticated hoofed mammal of the horse family with long ears and a braying call.
item.hdesc: Wata dabba mai shayar da kofato ta gida ta dangin doki mai dogayen kunnuwa da kirari.

item.name: Horse
item.desc: A domesticated for riding and as a draught animal, with a flowing mane and tail. It is usually ride by the king.
item.hdesc: Mai gida don hawa kuma a matsayin dabbar daftarin aiki, mai maniyyi mai gudana da wutsiya.

item.name: Monkey
item.desc: It is animal that lives in the bush and at time it can be a domesticated. It like eating banana. It can climb any kind of tree.
item.hdesc: Dabbobi ne da ke zaune a cikin daji kuma a lokacin yana iya zama ɗan gida.

item.name: Pig
item.desc: A domesticated hoofed mammal with sparse bristly hair and a flat snout, kept for its meat.
item.hdesc: Wata dabba mai shayar da kofato ta gida mai gashin kanta da santsi mai santsi, an ajiye don namanta.

item.name: Rabbit
item.desc: A burrowing gregarious plant-eating mammal, with long ears, long hind legs, and a short tail.
item.hdesc: Wata dabba mai shayarwa mai burrowing gregarious shuka, mai dogayen kunnuwa, dogayen kafafun baya, da gajeriyar wutsiya.

item.name: Ram
item.desc: An uncastrated male sheep. It is kept as livestock.
item.hdesc: Rago na namiji mara kiba.

item.name: Sheep
item.desc: A domesticated ruminant mammal with a thick woolly coat, kept in flocks for its wool or meat.
item.hdesc: Dabba mai shayarwa mai shayarwa mai kauri mai kauri mai kauri, wadda aka ajiye a cikin garken tumaki don ulu ko namansa.

item.name: Zebra
item.desc: A domesticated animal of a member of horse family. They have excellent hearing and eyesight and they can run fast.
item.hdesc: Dabbobin gida na dangin doki.

item.name: Giraffe
item.desc: A large African mammal with a very long neck and forelegs, the tallest living animal.
item.hdesc: Babban dabbar dabbar Afirka mai dogayen wuya da kafafun gaba, dabbar da ta fi tsayi.

item.name: Goat
item.desc: A domesticated animal usually killed for festival, ceremony etc
item.hdesc: Ana kashe dabbar gida don biki, biki da sauransu.

item.name: Camel
item.desc: A domesticated animal call the ship of desert. It has the ability to go for long period without drinking.
item.hdesc: Dabbar gida tana kiran jirgin hamada.

item.name: Tree Hyrax
item.desc: It is a stocky animal resemble big Guinea-pig. It can be found in forest. It feed on a variety of grasses, shrub and fruit.
item.hdesc: Dabba ce mai kaifi mai kama da babban alade na Guinea.

item.name: Potto
item.desc: It have long, slender bodies and limb with forelimbs and hindlimbs’ of nearly equal length. They have large eye and small round ear.
item.hdesc: Yana da dogayen jikku masu siririn jiki da gaɓa mai gaɓoɓi da gaɓoɓin baya ' kusan daidai da tsayi.

item.name: Cane rat
item.desc: It is heavyset of rat found in forest. It has a rounded nose, short ears, and incisors the growth continuously.
item.hdesc: Wani nau'in bera ne da ake samu a daji.

item.name: Hedgehog
item.desc: It is an animal that sleep throughout the day and wake up and start searching for food at night. Their coat is made up of sharp spines, which they expose as a defense mechanism.
item.hdesc: Dabba ce da take kwana da rana ta tashi ta fara neman abinci da daddare.

item.name: Tullberg's Rat
item.desc: It is family of rodent. It characterizes by a single pair of continuously growths incisors in each of their upper and lower jaws.
item.hdesc: Iyalin rodent ne.

item.name: Spootted Grassmouse
item.desc: It is a type of large rat whose tail is used by some chief as irùkẹ̀rẹ̀.
item.hdesc: Wani nau'i ne na babban bera wanda wasu shugabanni ke amfani da wutsiyarsa a matsayin irùkẹ̀rẹ̀.

item.name: Squirrel
item.desc: It is a rodent, very intelligent animal that uses different sound to communicate with other squirrel. It is usually found on palm oil tree to eats palm kennel pod.
item.hdesc: Rodent ne, dabba mai hankali da ke amfani da sauti daban-daban don sadarwa da sauran squirrel.

item.name: Crested Duiker
item.desc: These animals are very fast and have a very sharp sense of smell. They prefer to rest in dense thicket or between buttress roots of large tree.
item.hdesc: Wadannan dabbobi suna da sauri sosai kuma suna da kaifi sosai.

item.name: Bushbuck
item.desc: These antelope live in rain forests, montane forests and wood forest. It will lie flat on the ground when threatening or may run away producing series of hoarse barks.
item.hdesc: Waɗannan tururuwa suna rayuwa ne a cikin dazuzzukan ruwan sama, dazuzzukan montane da dajin itace.

item.name: Maxwell's Duiker
item.desc: It is a small antelope with slightly elevated back, short legs, a small head and short round ears. It prefer areas with fresh and dense growth of shrubs and other plant.
item.hdesc: Karamar tururuwa ce mai tsayin baya kadan, gajerun kafafu, karamin kai da gajerun kunnuwa.

item.name: Yellowbacked Duiker
item.desc: It is a forest dwelling antelope. These animals have a convex body shape, standing taller at the rump than the shoulders. It lives in the rain forest and they can be found in open bush.
item.hdesc: Ita ce tururuwa mazaunin daji.

item.name: Pot-1
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This is a pot usually used in preparing vegetables or melon soup.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ aláyọ́ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ tí wọ́n fí ń ṣe ẹ̀fọ́ àti ẹ̀gúsí.

item.name: Pot-4
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This is a pot usually used for cooking soup
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ abọ́ ayọ ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà o ní fífi yèpẹ̀ mọ. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ ìdáná tí wọ́n má ń fi í ṣe ọbẹ̀.

item.name: Pot-5
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This is a pot usually used for cooking soup
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ abọ́ ayọ ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà o ní fífi yèpẹ̀ mọ. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ ìdáná tí wọ́n má ń fi í ṣe ọbẹ̀.

item.name: Pot-6
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This is a pot usually used for cooking soup
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ abọ́ ayọ ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà o ní fífi yèpẹ̀ mọ. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ ìdáná tí wọ́n má ń fi í ṣe ọbẹ̀.

item.name: Pot-3
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This is a pot with a small size usually used in preparing food for a small number of people, especially when hosting a visitor. It is used in local eateries to prepared food like rice.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ aláyọ́ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ ìdáná kékeré fún ṣíṣe oúnjẹ fún àwọn ènìyàn péréte, pàápàá jù lọ nígbà gbígba àlejò. Wọ́n máá fi ń ṣe oúnjẹ bíi ráìsì nílé ìjẹun ìbílẹ̀.

item.name: Pot-2
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This is a pot with a big size usually used in preparing food for a large number of people in various public spaces. It is used in local eateries to prepared food like rice.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ aláyọ́ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ ìdáná tó tóbi fún ṣíṣe oúnjẹ fún ọ̀pọ̀ ènìyàn ní ìta gbangba. Wọ́n máá fi ń ṣe oúnjẹ bíi ráìsì nílé ìjẹun ìbílẹ̀.

item.name: Garri Pot
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This pot is used to frying cassava flour (garri) and it can also be used to prepared soup.
item.ydesc: Ójẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ aláyọ́ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ ìdáná tí wọ́n má ń fi yan gaàrí, wọ́n tún má fi ń ṣe ọbẹ̀.

item.name: Perforated Spoon
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This spoon is usually used in frying akara, fish and meat etc in order to avoid wastage of vegetable oil.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ aláyọ́ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀. Eléyìí jẹ́ síbí tí wọ́n fí ń yan àkàrà, ẹja, ẹran àti bẹ́ẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ láti dènà ì fi epo ṣòfò.

item.name: Spoon
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This spoon usually used in stirring soup.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ aláyọ̀ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀ mọ. Eléyìí jẹ́ síbí tí wọ́n fí ń ro ọbẹ̀.

item.name: Herb-Pot
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This pot is purposely used in the preparation of herbs.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ abọ́ ayọ ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà o ní fífi yèpẹ̀ mọ. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ ìdáná tí wọ́n má fi ń ṣe àgbo.

item.name: Stove
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This is a locally made stove used with a charcoal used in preparing different type of food.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ aláyọ́ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀. Eléyìí àrò́ ìdáná eléèérú tí wọ́n má fi n ṣe orísìírísìí oúnjẹ.

item.name: Groundnut Pot
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This is a pot usually used for frying ground nut.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ aláyọ́ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ tí wọ́n fí ń yan ẹ̀pà.

item.name: Yam Flour Pot
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. This is a pot usually used for ceremony or party in making amala or semo-vita.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ aláyọ́ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀. Eléyìí jẹ́ apẹ tí wọ́n má fi ń ro àmàlà àti sẹ̀mó.

item.name: Baby bath
item.desc: It is an indigenous or locally made aluminum cookware based on the sand-casting method. It is used in the holding day for bathing baby and also used to display of wares in the marketplace.
item.ydesc: Ó jẹ́ nǹkan ìdáná́ ìbílẹ̀ aláyọ́ tí wọ́n mọ láti ibi ìlànà lílo yèpẹ̀. Wọ́n má fi ń wẹ ọmọdé ní ayé àtijọ́ àti fún pípa àtẹ ní ọjà.

item.name: Pitchers
item.desc: It is local made pot, mould from clay soil. This pot is purposely used to prepare the mixture of herb and leaves with water for medicinal use.
item.ydesc: Orùàgbo jẹ́ ìkòkò ìbílẹ̀ti wọ́n fi amọ̀ mọ. Ìkòkò yí wà fún kí ki àgbo fún ìwòsàn.

item.name: Perforated Pot
item.desc: It is traditional pot made from clay soil. The pot surrounded with a hole around it. This pot is use for ancestral worship and traditional healing ritual.
item.ydesc: Ajere jẹ ìkòkò ìsẹ̀ǹbáyé tí wọ́n fi amọ̀ mọ. Ìkòkò yí ní ihò lára káàkiri. Ìkòkò yí wà fún ìjọ́sìn ìsẹ̀ǹbáyé àti ètùtù ìwòsàn.

item.name: Dye-pot
item.desc: It is traditional pot made from clay soil. This pot is used to soak cloth during batik production.
item.ydesc: Àmù aláró jẹ́ ìkòkò ìsẹ̀ǹbáyé tí wọ́n fi àmọ̀ mọ. Ìkòkò yí wà fún rí rẹ aṣọ nígbà tí wọ́n bá ń ṣe àdìrẹ̀.

item.name: Plate
item.desc: It is traditional pot made from clay soil. The pot is use to prepared a traditional concoction for ancestral worship and traditional healing ritual.
item.ydesc: Àwo ìpèsè jẹ́ ìkòkò ìsẹ̀ǹbáyé tí wọ́n fi àmọ̀ mọ. Ìkòkò yí wà fún sí ṣe ìpèsè fún ìjọ́sìn ìsẹ̀ǹbáyé àti ètùtù ìwòsàn.

item.name: Lamp-1
item.desc: It is a traditional lamp made from clay soil. It a lamp one (1) thumb point with a cottonwood. The palm oil is split at the thumb point. The lamp is used for utilitarian, ritualistic, and symbolic purposes.
item.ydesc: Fìtílà olójú kan jẹ àtùpà alámọ̀. Ó jẹ́ àtùpà olójú kan pẹ̀lú òwú ètùtù. Epo pupa ni wọ́n fí ń tàn án. Àtùpà yí wà fún lílo nínú ilé fún ìríran, gbígbé ẹbọ àti fún ìsàmì.

item.name: lamp-3
item.desc: It is a traditional lamp made from clay soil. It a lamp three (3) thumb point with a cottonwood. The palm oil is split at the thumb point. The lamp is used for utilitarian, ritualistic, and symbolic purposes.
item.ydesc: Fìtílà olójú mẹ́ta jẹ àtùpà alámọ̀. Ó jẹ́ àtùpà olójú mẹ́ta pẹ̀lú òwú ètùtù. Epo pupa ni wọ́n fí ń tàn án. Àtùpà yí wà fún lílo nínú ilé fún ìríran, gbígbé ẹbọ àti fún ìsàmì.

item.name: Lamp-4
item.desc: It is a traditional lamp made from clay soil. It a lamp four (4) thumb point with a cottonwood. The palm oil is split at the thumb point. The lamp is used for utilitarian, ritualistic, and symbolic purposes.
item.ydesc: Fìtílà olójú mẹ́rin jẹ àtùpà alámọ̀. Ó jẹ́ àtùpà olójú mẹ́rin pẹ̀lú òwú ètùtù. Epo pupa ni wọ́n fí ń tàn án. Àtùpà yí wà fún lílo nínú ilé fún ìríran, gbígbé ẹbọ àti fún ìsàmì.

item.name: Lamp-16
item.desc: It is a traditional lamp made from clay soil. It a lamp sixteenth (16) thumb point with a cottonwood. The palm oil is split at the thumb point. The lamp is used for utilitarian, ritualistic, and symbolic purposes.
item.ydesc: Fìtílà olójú mẹrìndínlóógún jẹ àtùpà alámọ̀. Ó jẹ́ àtùpà olójú mẹrìndínlóógún pẹ̀lú òwú ètùtù. Epo pupa ni wọ́n fí ń tàn án. Àtùpà yí wà fún lílo nínú ilé fún ìríran, gbígbé ẹbọ àti fún ìsàmì.

item.name: Osun-pot
item.desc: It is a traditional lamp made from clay soil. It used for ritual healing and traditional ancestral worship. This pot is usually used during Osun osogbo deity festival.
item.ydesc: Ìkòkò ọlọ́sun jẹ́ ẹ́ ìkòkò alámọ̀ ìṣẹ̀ǹbáyé. Ó wà fún ìwòsàn ẹ̀lẹ́bọ àti ìjọsìn àwọn alálẹ̀. Wọ́n má ń lo ìkòkò náà nígbà tí wọ́n bá ń ṣe ọdún ọ̀sun Osogbo.

item.name: Bank
item.desc: It is a traditional made bank, mould from clay soil. It is form of circle with a small hole at the top. It is used to keep money.
item.ydesc: Kóló jẹ́ ìfowópamọ́ ìbílẹ̀ alámọ̀. Ó rí róbótó pẹ̀lú ihò lórí. Ó wà ìfowópamọ́.

item.name: Soup-bowl-1
item.desc: It is a traditional pot made from clay soil. It is used for different purposes for cooking, fermentation, ancestral worship, traditional healing ritual and deity.
item.ydesc: Ìsasùn ńlá jẹ́ ẹ́ ìkòkò alámọ̀ ìṣẹ̀ǹbáyé. Ó wà fún ọ̀kanòjọ̀kan ìwúlò bíi ìdáná, ìrẹ nǹkan, ìjọsìn àwọn alálẹ̀, ìwòsàn ìbílẹ̀ àti ètùtù.

item.name: Soup-bowl-2
item.desc: It is a traditional pot made from clay soil. It is used for cooking soup.
item.ydesc: Ìsasùn ọbẹ̀ jẹ́ ìkòkò ìbílẹ̀ alámọ̀. Ó wà fún ṣíṣe ọbẹ̀.

item.name: Soup-bowl-3
item.desc: It is a traditional pot made from clay soil. It is used for prepared traditional concoction for healing ritual for individual.
item.ydesc: Àwo ìpèsè-ńlá jẹ́ìkòkò alámọ̀ ìṣẹ̀ǹbáyé. Ó wà fún ṣíṣe àsèjẹ láti se ìwòsàn ẹbọ àwọn ènìyàn.

item.name: Plate-1
item.desc: It is traditional big pot made from clay soil. The pot is use to prepared a traditional concoction for ancestral worship and traditional healing ritual.
item.ydesc: Ìsasùn àsèjẹ jẹ́ ẹ́ ìkòkò alámọ̀ ìṣẹ̀ǹbáyé. Ó wà fún ṣíṣe àsèjẹ láti se ìwòsàn ẹbọ àwọn ènìyàn.

item.name: Healing Pot
item.desc: It is traditional small pot made from clay. The pot is used to prepare for traditional healing ritual and deity.
item.ydesc: Kònjò jẹ́ ẹ́ ìkòkò kékeré alámọ̀ ìṣẹ̀ǹbáyé. Ó wà fún ṣíṣe ìwòsàn ẹlẹbọ àti ètùtù.

item.name: Fryer-Pot
item.desc: It is traditional big pot made from clay. The pot is used to prepared local charms and medicine by herbalist and traditionalists.
item.ydesc: Agbada ìjóògùn jẹ́ ẹ́ ìkòkò alámọ̀ ìṣẹ̀ǹbáyé tó tóbi Ó wà fún ṣíṣe àwọn òògùn ìbílẹ̀ àti oògùn àìsàn ara nílé aláwo àti oníṣègùn.

item.name: Water-cooler
item.desc: It is traditional big pot made from clay. The pot is used to store water. The water stored in this pot will be chill or cold for some period.
item.ydesc: Àmù jẹ́ ẹ́ ìkòkò alámọ̀ ìṣẹ̀ǹbáyé tó tóbi . Omi ni wọ́n máá fí ń pọn pamọ́. Omi tí wọ́n bá pọn sí inú àmù má ń tutù fún ìgbà díẹ̀.

item.name: Bat
item.desc: The nature and symbols attached to animals and plants are used in African tie and dye textiles. The bat symbol on tie and dye textiles stands for the rich Yoruba cultural heritage. These pictures may be used to share thoughts with people in different cultures.
item.ydesc: Ìsẹ̀dá àti àmì tó rọ̀ mọ́ àwọn ẹranko àti ewéko jẹ́ nǹkan lílò níbi aṣọ àdìrẹ ní ilẹ̀ adúláwọ̀. Àmì Àdán lára aṣọ àdìrẹ dúró fún àṣà Yorùbá tó kún fọ́fọ́. Àwòrán wọ̀n yí le jẹ́ lílò láti ṣe àfihàn èrò sí àwọn ènìyàn pẹ̀lú ọ̀kanòjọ̀kan àṣà.

item.desc: The nature and symbols attached to animals and plants are used in African tie and dye textiles. The Wire of lie symbol on tie and dye textiles stands for the rich Yoruba cultural heritage. These pictures may be used to share thoughts with people in different cultures.
item.ydesc: Ìsẹ̀dá àti àmì tó rọ̀ mọ́ àwọn ẹranko àti ewéko jẹ́ nǹkan lílò níbi aṣọ àdìrẹ ní ilẹ̀ adúláwọ̀. Àmì wáyà lára aṣọ àdìrẹ dúró fún àṣà Yorùbá tó kún fọ́fọ́. Àwòrán wọ̀n yí le jẹ́ lílò láti ṣe àfihàn èrò sí àwọn ènìyàn pẹ̀lú ọ̀kanòjọ̀kan àṣà.

item.name: Axe
item.desc: An axe is a wood-cutting tool with a sharp metal blade attached to a long handle.
item.hdesc: Gatari kayan aikin yankan itace ne mai kaifi mai kaifi a manne da dogon hannu.
item.idesc: Ányùíke bụ̀ íhé á nà-èjí ègbú ósísí nwéré àhụ́ dị́ ńkọ́ étìnyèrè n'áká yá
item.ydesc: Àáké jẹ́ oun èèlò ìgé igi tó ní irin tó mú lórí igi tàbí irin ìgbámú tó gùn.

item.name: Knife
item.desc: Knife is a tool or weapon with a cutting edge or blade, usually attached to a handle or hilt.
item.hdesc: Wuka kayan aiki ne ko makami tare da yankan baki ko wuka, yawanci haɗe da hannu ko ƙugiya.
item.idesc: Ḿmà ụ́zụ bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ nwere ọ́nụ́ dị ńkọ́ á nà-ètínyé n'áká yá.
item.ydesc: Ọ̀bẹ ẹ jẹ oun èèlò tàbí oun ìjà tó ní ẹnu tàbí abẹ ìgé nǹkan pẹ̀lú èèkù ní ìdí.

item.name: Bellow
item.desc: A tool with air bag that emits a stream of air when squeezed together with two handles, used for blowing air into a fire.
item.hdesc: Kayan aiki mai jakar iska wanda ke fitar da rafin iska lokacin da aka matse shi tare da hannaye biyu, ana amfani da shi don hura iska cikin wuta.
item.idesc: Ńgwá ọ́rụ nwéré àkpá ìkùkù ná-éwépụ́ ìkùkù m̀gbè á pị̀kọ̀tàrà yá ọ́nụ nwéré áká àbụ́ọ́ éjì áfụ̀ ọ́kụ ìkùkù.
item.ydesc: Ẹwìrì jẹ́ oun èèlò tó ní ilé atẹ́gùn tó sì má ń fẹ́ atẹ́gùn síta nígbàtí wọ́n bá tẹ igi méjéèjì ìdí i rẹ̀ papọ̀. Wọ́n máa fi ń fẹ́ atẹ́gùn sì inú iná ni

item.name: Grab hoe
item.desc: It is framing equipment usually used to hold metal irons that form a hoe. It is wood manufacture by blacksmiths.
item.hdesc: Kayan aiki ne da aka saba amfani da shi don riƙe ƙarfe na ƙarfe waɗanda ke yin fartanya.
item.idesc: Ọ́ bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ éjì éjìdé ígwè ná èmépùtá ọ́gụ̀.ọ́ bụ̀ ósísí ọ̀kpụ́ụzụ mépụ̀tàrà
item.ydesc: Èrúkọ́ jẹ́ féréèmù tó máa ń gbé irin ọkọ́ dúró. Àwọn alágbẹ̀dẹ lò máa ń ṣe pẹ̀lú igi.

item.name: Paml Kennel Shell
item.desc: It is the hard shell of the oil palm fruit seed that is broken to take out the kernel used for extracting palm oil. The shells are used for cooking and it is used by blacksmiths and goldsmiths to heat the metal.
item.hdesc: Harsashi mai kauri ne na 'ya'yan itacen dabino da aka karye don fitar da kwaya da ake amfani da ita wajen hako dabino.
item.idesc: Ọ́ bụ̀ ókpókóró ḿkpụ́rụ́ ákị á nà-àgbọ́wá íji wépụ̀tá ákị éjì èwépụ̀tá ḿmánụ́ ńri. É jì ókpókóró yá èsí ńri nàkwà ńdí ọ̀kpụ́ụzụ nà ọ̀kpụ́ ọ́láèdò nà éji yá àkwányé ígwè ọ́kụ́.
item.ydesc: Eésan jẹ́ ẹ́ èèpo líle tí ẹyìn dúró lé lórí tí ó sì máa ń jẹ́ pí pa láti yọ èkùrọ́ nínú un rẹ̀. Eésan wúlò fún iná dí dá. Ó sì tún wúlò fún àwọn alágbẹ̀dẹ àti àwọn gosimíìtì láti fi iná yọ́ irin.

item.name: Cutlass
item.desc: A cutlass is a tool that is used for cutting through vegetation, such as crops or weeds. It is a handheld tool that is typically about 2 feet long and has a curved blade. It is also used for clearing areas of land for farming or other purposes.
item.hdesc: Yanke kayan aiki ne da ake amfani dashi.
item.idesc: Égbútù bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ éjì àsụ́chásị́ ọ́hị́á nàkwà ègbútùsí ósísí.Á nà-èjí yá àrụ́ ọ́rụ́ n'àlà nàkwà n'úbì.
item.ydesc: Àdá jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n máa ń fi gé oko bíi oun ọ̀gbìn tàbí koríko. Irin iṣẹ́ mímú lọ́wọ́ ni, tó sì má ń sábà gùn ní ìwọ̀n bàtà ẹsẹ̀ méjì pẹ̀lú ẹnu abẹ tó tẹ. Àdá wúlò fún oko gígé fún iṣẹ́ àgbẹ̀ tàbí fún nǹkan mìíràn

item.name: Gun
item.desc: A weapon incorporating a metal tube from which bullets, shells, are propelled by explosive force and with sharp noise. It is used by hunter for killing an animal in the bush.
item.hdesc: Makamin da ya haɗa da bututun ƙarfe wanda harsashi, harsashi, ke motsawa da ƙarfi da ƙarfi da hayaniya.
item.idesc: Égbè bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ nwéré ḿgbọ́ á nà-èjí àgbágbú ụ́mụ́ ánụ́ọ́hị́á.
item.ydesc: Ìbọn ọ́n jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ ìjà tó ṣe àmúlò irin lè yìí tó jẹ́ pé ọta àti èèpo lile máa ń jáde nínú un rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú agbára ariwo tó rinlẹ̀. Àwọn ọdẹ máa ń lò ó láti pa ẹran nínú igbó.

item.name: Ring
item.desc: It is made up metal steel and it is manufacture by blacksmith. It is used to show commitment, devotion, and love to the woman.
item.hdesc: Karfe ne aka yi shi, kuma maƙera ne ke kera shi.
item.idesc: M̀gbànáká bụ̀ íhé ónyé ọ̀kpụ́ụzụ nà-èmépụ̀tá.É jì yá ègósí íhụnànyá nà ídínótù nwóké nà nwáànyị̀.
item.ydesc: Orúkọ jẹ́ oun tí wọ́n máa ń fi irin ṣe. Àwọn alágbẹ̀dẹ ló sì máa ń ṣe é. Wọ́n má ń fi òrùka ṣe àfihàn, ìfọkànsìn àti ìfẹ́ sí obìnrin.

item.name: Bick iron
item.desc: It is a considered a small version of a Blacksmith's Anvil. It is used in Tinsmithing and by others for general working of sheet metal.
item.hdesc: An yi la'akari da ƙaramin sigar maƙarƙashiya.
item.idesc: Ọ́ bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ éjì àrụ́ ọ́rụ n'ígwè.

item.name: Tipper load
item.desc: A tool that has a long blade and a flat surface and is used for digging. It is used for digging holes in the soil and it is also used to load sand in a truck or tipper.
item.hdesc: Kayan aiki wanda ke da dogon ruwa da shimfidar wuri kuma ana amfani dashi don tono.
item.idesc: Ńgwá ọ́rụ nwéré ógólógó àhụ́ ńkọ éjì ègwú àlà màọ̀bụ̀ tínyé ája nà típà.
item.ydesc: Sọ̀ńkú jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ tó ní abẹ tó gùn àti ojú pẹlẹbẹ, èyí tí wọ́n máa ń fi gbẹ́ kòtò nínú ilẹ̀. Wọ́n tún máa ń fi ń kó yèpẹ̀ sí inú ọkọ̀ akóyèpẹ̀.

item.name: Punch
item.desc: Punches are used to drive fasteners such as nails and dowels, making a hole, or forming used to create a pattern or even form an image. Some have wooden handles while others have metal.
item.hdesc: Ana amfani da naushi don fitar da ƙusoshi kamar ƙusoshi da kusoshi, yin rami, ko ƙirƙira da ake amfani da su don ƙirƙirar tsari ko ma yin hoto.
item.idesc: Á nà-èjí yá ètínyé ǹtú n'ímé ósísí.Áká yá bụ̀ ósísí mànà ébé ńdí ọzọ dị̀kà ígwè.
item.ydesc: Ìlu ú jẹ́ òun tí wọ́n máa fi ń so nǹkan bí i èsó àti dówẹ́ẹ̀lì, lí lu ihò tàbí hun àwòrán. Àwọn ẹ̀yà ìlu kan an máa ń ní èèkù o ní igi tàbí o ní irin.

item.name: Scissors
item.desc: It is made of steel, specifically carbon steel, while others are made from stainless steel. It is cutting instruments consisting of a pair of metal blades; it is used cut metal sheets such as steel, stainless steel, and aluminum plates, as well as cardboard, plywood, and electrical wires.
item.hdesc: An yi shi da karfe, musamman karfen carbon, yayin da wasu kuma daga bakin karfe ne.
item.idesc: Á nà-èjí yá áchà íhé àbụ́ọ màọ̀bụ̀ áchàké íhé ná-àdị́ghị árụ.
item.ydesc: Irin ni wọ́n máa fi ń ṣe sísọ́ọ̀sì pàápàá jùlọ irin eléèédú, tí wọ́n sì fi irin dídán ṣe àwọn mìíràn. Irin iṣẹ́ ìgé nǹkan ni tó ní ẹnu alábẹ oníbejì. Wọ́n máa fi ń gé irin fẹ́lẹ́fẹ́lẹ́ bíi sítíìlì, irin dídán àti irin ayọ́ pẹ̀lú páálí, igi fẹ́lẹ́fẹ́lẹ́ àti wáyà iná.

item.name: Head cutting knife
item.desc: It is a sharpest knife blades available are razor blades. It is used to cut hair, usually for softer effect. It is used for the removal of nape hair, facial hair design, and the trimming of eyebrows.
item.hdesc: Yana da mafi kaifi mafi kyawun wuka da ake samu akwai ɗigon reza.
item.idesc: Ọ́ bụ̀ ḿma dị̀kásị́ ńkọ́ kà ágụ̀bá á nà-èjí yá àkpụ́chásị́ ńtùtù.
item.ydesc: Ọ̀bẹ ìfá irungbọn jẹ́ abẹ fẹ́lẹ́. Wọ́n máa fi ń fá irun pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rọ̀ wọ́ọ́rọ́. Wọ́n máa fi ń fá irun ẹ̀yìn ọrùn, fi dárà sí irun ojú àti fún rírẹ irun ìpéǹpéjú nílẹ̀. Wọ́n máa fi ń fá irun ráúráú.

item.name: Anvil
item.desc: It is basic tools of blacksmith. It is used to shape metal, usually by forging it. An anvil is a large, heavy block of metal that is used for shaping metal by hammering it with a hammer.
item.hdesc: Kayan aiki ne na asali na maƙera.
item.idesc: Á nà-èjí yá ányà ígwè.ọ́ nà-ébù mà dị́kwá ézígbó árụ.
item.ydesc: Àkànmọ́lẹ̀ jẹ́ ẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ alágbèdẹ. Wọ́n máa fi ń ṣe àtúndá irin, pàápàá jù lọ pẹ̀lú ù fí fi na irin mọ́lẹ̀ lẹ́yìn yíyọ kúrò nínú iná. Àkànmọ́lẹ̀ jẹ́ irin ní ńlá tó wúwo fún nína irin mọ́lẹ̀.

item.name: File
item.desc: A file is a tool used to remove fine amounts of material from a workpiece. It is used to cut, smooth, or remove small measures of metal steels, wood, plastic, or other material. It is made in different lengths, shapes, and cuts.
item.hdesc: Fayil kayan aiki ne da ake amfani da shi don cire kyawawan adadin abu daga kayan aiki.
item.idesc: Á nà-èjí yá èwépụ̀chá ụ́mụ̀íyíríyí íhé ńdí nọ́gásị́ n'àhụ́ ósísí íji mée kà ọ́ dị́ ḿma n'ányá.
item.ydesc: Ìpọ́nrin jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ tí a le fi mú ìwọ̀nba díẹ̀ kúrò lára oun iṣẹ́. Wọ́n máa fi ń gé nǹkan, dán nǹkan tàbí mú díẹ̀ kúrò lára irin, igi, ike, tàbí àwọn nǹkan mìíràn. Wọ́n máa ń ṣe é ní orísìírísìí ìwọ̀n, ṣéèpù àti ìrí.

item.name: Knife for cow
item.desc: Knife is a tool or weapon with a cutting edge or blade, usually used to kill a cow.
item.hdesc: Wuka kayan aiki ne ko makami mai yankan baki ko tsinke, galibi ana amfani da shi wajen kashe saniya.
item.idesc: Ḿmà éhi bụ̀ íhé nwéré àhụ́ dị́ ézígbó ńkọ. Á nà-èjí yá ègbú éhi
item.ydesc: Ọ̀bẹ ni irin iṣẹ́ tàbí oun ìjà pẹ̀lú ẹnu ìgé nǹkan tàbí abẹ. A máa sábà fi ń pa màálù.

item.name: Hoe
item.desc: A hoe is a farm tool used to cultivate the soil that can be used for planting seeds.
item.hdesc: Fartanya kayan aikin gona ne da ake amfani da shi don noma ƙasar da za a iya amfani da ita don shuka iri.
item.idesc: Ọ́gụ̀ bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ úbì á nà-èjí àkụ́ íhé.
item.ydesc: Ọkọ́ jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ oko dídá láti kọ ilẹ̀ fún ún gbí gbin irúgbìn.

item.name: Hook
item.desc: It is a piece of metal or other hard material curved or bent back at an angle, for catching hold of or hanging things on.
item.hdesc: Karfe ne ko wani abu mai kauri mai lankwasa ko lankwasa baya a kusurwa, don kamawa ko rataya abubuwa a kai.
item.idesc: Ọ́ bụ̀ íhé á nà-èjí àchụ́tá íhé.ọ́nụ́ yá nyàrà ányà. Á nà-èjí yá àchụ́tá ázụ̀.
item.ydesc: Ìwọ̀ ńlá jẹ́ irin béńbé tàbí nǹkan mìíràn tó le tó tún tẹ̀ ṣé yìn ni déédéé ìwọ̀n igun kan fún mímú tàbí gbígbé nǹkan dúró.

item.name: Security
item.desc: It is a piece of metal or other hard material curved or bent back at an angle, for catching hold of or hanging things on. It is usually placed at the back of door of house and used for security purposed.
item.hdesc: Ƙarfe ne ko wani abu mai kauri mai lanƙwasa ko lankwasa baya a kusurwa, don kamawa ko rataye abubuwa a kai.
item.idesc: Ọ́ bụ̀ íhé á nà-èjí èjìdé íhé kà ọ́ ghàrá ị́dapụ̀.Á nà ètínyékwá ya n'àzụ́ ụ́zọ̀ ụ́lọ̀ màkà ńchékwá
item.ydesc: Kónílé ógbélé jẹ́ irin béńbé tàbí nǹkan mìíràn tó le tó tún tẹ̀ ṣé yìn ni déédéé ìwọ̀n igun kan an, fún mímú tàbí gbígbé nǹkan dúró. Wọ́n má ń sáábà fi sí ẹ̀yìn ìlẹ̀kùn fún ṣíṣe ààbò.

item.name: Sickle
item.desc: It is a tool used for harvests cocoa tree. It is a curved steel edged blade fixed to the wooden handled the cutting edge may be plain depending upon the design.
item.hdesc: Kayan aiki ne da ake amfani da shi don girbi itacen koko.
item.idesc: Ọ́ dị̀ kà ḿmà.Ọ́ dị̀ ézígbó ńkọ mà nyàkwá ànyá. Á nà-èjí yá àhọ́tàpụ̀tá òsìkápá
item.ydesc: Ìkákòkó jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n fí ń ká kòkó lórí igi i rẹ̀. Ó jẹ́ abẹ onírin tó tẹ̀ pẹ̀lú u dí dè mọ́ igi. Ẹnu abẹ ẹ rẹ̀ le jẹ́ ọlọ́bọ̀rọ́ ní àgbékalẹ́ rírọ ọ rẹ̀.

item.name: Pick mattock
item.desc: It a tool with short handles and a stout head which combines a vertical axe blade particular used for cultivate a palm oil tree.
item.hdesc: kayan aiki ne mai guntuwar hannu da katon kai wanda ya hada da gatari a tsaye musamman da ake amfani da shi wajen noman bishiyar dabino.
item.idesc: Ńgù bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ dị́ ógólógó mà nwékwá àhû dị ńkọ́ éjì àhọ́tá ósísí ákwụ.
item.ydesc: Àáké ọ̀pẹ jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú orí tó sanra tó mú abẹ onírin tó nàró.

item.name: Hoe
item.desc: A hoe is a farm tool used to cultivate the soil that can be used for planting seeds.
item.hdesc: Fartanya kayan aikin gona ne da ake amfani da shi don noma ƙasar da za a iya amfani da ita don shuka iri.
item.idesc: Ọ́gụ̀ bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ úbì á nà-èjí àkụ́ íhé.
item.ydesc: Ọ̀kọ́ ìkọbè jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ oko tí wọ́n fí ń kọ ilẹ̀ fún ebè láti dá oko

item.name: Hoe
item.desc: A hoe is a farm tool used to removing a weed on a farm land, before planting a seeds.
item.hdesc: Fartanya kayan aikin gona ne da ake amfani da shi don noma ƙasar da za a iya amfani da ita don shuka iri.
item.idesc: Ọ́gụ̀ bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ úbì á nà-èjí àkụ́ íhé.
item.ydesc: Ọ̀kọ́ ìroko jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ oko tí wọ́n fí ń ro oko síwájú gbìn gbin irúgbìn.

item.name: Chisel
item.desc: It is used for cutting or splitting hot steel, these may also be used to lay lines out on cold mild steel as well. They are hardened, tempered and ground after forging.
item.hdesc: Ana amfani da shi don yanke ko tsaga karfe mai zafi, ana iya amfani da waɗannan don shimfiɗa layi akan ƙaramin ƙarfe mai sanyi kuma.
item.idesc: Á nà-éjì yá èkèwá ígwè dị̀ ọ́kụ.
item.ydesc: Ọmọ oówú jẹ irin iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n fí ń gé irin gbígbóná tàbí kí wọ́n fi yà sọ́tọ̀. Wọ́n tún le fi fa ìlà sí ara irin tí kò tutù jú.

item.name: Drift
item.desc: It is an implement that has been used for to shape, split, and cut wood, to harvest timber, as a weapon, and as a ceremonial symbol.
item.hdesc: Kayan aiki ne da aka yi amfani da shi don siffata, tsagawa, da yanke itace, don girbi katako, a matsayin makami, da kuma alamar bikin.
item.idesc: Á nà-éjì yá èkèwá íhé màọ̀bụ̀ ósísí àbụ́ọ́.
item.ydesc: Àáké bórò jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ń gbẹ́ igi, tàbí, yà sọ́tọ̀ tàbí gé e. Ó wúlò fún nǹkan ìjà àti àmì ayẹyẹ.

item.name: Hammer
item.desc: A tool with a heavy metal head mounted at right angles at the end of a handle and is used by blacksmith to deliver controlled force to shape and manipulate hot metal.
item.hdesc: Kayan aiki tare da kai mai nauyi wanda aka ɗora a kusurwoyi madaidaici a ƙarshen hannu kuma maƙerin ke amfani dashi don isar da ƙarfin sarrafawa don siffa da sarrafa ƙarfe mai zafi.
item.idesc: Hámà bụ̀ ígwè á nà-èjí àkụ́bànyé ǹtú n'ímé ósísí màọ̀bụ̀ àkụ́ íhé.
item.ydesc: Òòlù jẹ́ irin iṣẹ́ tó ní irin tó wúwo lórí ní igun apá ọ̀tún lòpin èèkù. Àwọn alágbẹ̀dẹ mọ́ ń fí rọ irin gbígbóná àti àtúndá a rẹ̀.

item.name: Pinser
item.desc: It is a tool used to grip and lift objects instead of holding them directly with hands.
item.hdesc: Kayan aiki ne da ake amfani da shi don kamawa da ɗaga abubuwa maimakon riƙe su kai tsaye da hannu.
item.idesc: Ǹké à bụ̀ íhé á nà-èjí èjìdé íhé màọ̀bụ̀ jí yá búlíé íhé élú mà áchọ́ghị ímétụ́ yá áká.
item.ydesc: Ẹ̀mú jẹ irin iṣẹ́ ìmú nǹkan láti gbé e sókè, yàtọ̀ sí fí fi ọwọ́ lásán mú un.

item.name: Trap
item.desc: It is metal steel device design by blacksmith for farmer to catch and retain animals on a farm. It is basically design by allowing entry but not exit or by catching hold of a part of the body.
item.hdesc: Na'urar karfe ce ta maƙera don manomi don kamawa da riƙe dabbobi a gona.
item.idesc: Ọ́nyà bụ̀ íhé ndị́ ńta nà-èjí èjìdé ụ́mụ̀ ánụ́ ọ́hị́á.
item.ydesc: Tàkúté jẹ irin iṣẹ́ tí àwọn alágbẹ̀dẹ ẹ́ rọ fún àwọn àgbẹ̀ láti mú ẹranko sílẹ̀ ní oko. Wọ́n ṣe ìsẹ̀dá a rẹ̀ láti ni ọ̀nà àbáwọlé láìní àbájáde tàbí láti mú apá kan sílẹ̀.

item.name: Gun bullet
item.desc: It is a metal projectile for firing from a rifle, usually designed in a cylindrical shape. It is basically used by hunter for killing animal.
item.hdesc: Ƙarfe ne don harbi daga bindiga, yawanci ana tsara shi da siffa mai siliki.
item.idesc: Égbè ḿkpálị̀ bụ̀ ńgwá ọ́rụ nwéré ḿgbọ́ á nà-èjí àgbágbú ụ́mụ́ ánụ́ọ́hị́á.
item.ydesc: Ọta ìbọn jẹ́ irin sóńsó tí wọ́n ń fí yìn ìbọn tí wọ́n ìsẹ̀dá a rẹ̀ bíi ìdúró sìlíndà. Àwọn ọdẹ ni wọ́n má fi ń pa ẹranko.
